functions.name: register
functions.description: Register a user script programmatically given its $(ref:userScripts.UserScriptOptions), and resolves to a $(ref:userScripts.RegisteredUserScript) instance

js.description: The list of JS files to inject

allOf.description: An opaque user script metadata value

allFrames.description: If allFrames is true, implies that the JavaScript should be injected into all frames of current page. By default, it's false and is only injected into the top frame.

matchAboutBlank.description: If matchAboutBlank is true, then the code is also injected in about:blank and about:srcdoc frames if your extension has access to its parent document. Code cannot be inserted in top-level about:-frames. By default it is false.

allOf.description: The soonest that the JavaScript will be injected into the tab. Defaults to "document_idle".

RegisteredUserScript.description: An object that represents a user script registered programmatically

functions.name: unregister
functions.description: Unregister a user script registered programmatically

events.name: onBeforeScript
events.description: Event called when a new userScript global has been created

metadata.description: The userScript metadata (as set in userScripts.register)

defineGlobals.description: Exports all the properties of a given plain object as userScript globals

parameters.name: sourceObject
parameters.description: A plain object whose properties are exported as userScript globals

export.description: Convert a given value to make it accessible to the userScript code

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: A value to convert into an object accessible to the userScript
